explains: adj. 受灾的，患病的，受困扰的；（脸或表情）非常悲痛的，极其忧伤的

sentences.en: We went to the aid of the stricken boat.
sentences.cn: 我们前去救助那艘失事的船。

sentences.en: The queen was grief-stricken over his death.
sentences.cn: 女王对他的死极度悲痛。

sentences.en: Whole villages were stricken with the disease.
sentences.cn: 整村整村的人染上了这种病。
